title: Fs: T206 addie joss (port) Sov. 150! Looks like a 7!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: Fs: T206 addie joss (port) Sov. 150! Looks like a 7!
posts.post_content: Tough Sovereign 150, Not trimmed, but has a tiny spot in the yellow background that was touched up and shows up under blacklight. If you are looking for a card with an ultra highend look that is not trimmed, this one's for you. $495, scans below....thanks
I have already had a few emails pertaining this card. Can anyone help me with posting scans to the thread? The problem is my scans are pdf format....thanks

[quote name="Vegas-guy" post=1035633]PM Leon he will help..:)[/QUOTE]

I already told Kevin (hi Kevin) that the scans need to be in a jpg format. They can be converted from pdf to jpg but it's time consuming and I just can't do it. The solution is to scan them in the correct format.
the key is to use the "Snipping Tool"...it's generally under "Programs -> Accessories" in your start menu.  Then just paste it into MS Paint.
$450, card truly looks like a 7 without the price tag.....thanks
